title: Introduction to Electronic Sensors
headline: Study pressure sensors, photoemissive cells and fiber optics in this free course on different types of electric sensors.
description: This free online course provides you with an understanding of what an electronic sensor is. It goes into detail about the various characteristics and uses of the sensors. Next, you will find information about photoemissive cells and fiber optic sensors. Finally, the course answers questions such as: What are pressure sensors? How do you use a U-tube manometer? How do you use an ultrasonic sensor?

courseDescription:
In this free online course, you study accurate information on the working principles of an electronic sensor. It explains and defines the characteristics and functions of a general sensor as well as guiding you through specific information about photoconductive cells and fiber optic sensors. Learn about pressure sensors, U-tube manometers and diaphragm pressure gauges. Next, we discuss the definition of a Bourdon gauge, a diaphragm pressure gauge and other instruments to measure pressure.

Next, the material teaches you about the Hall effect current sensor. You will learn how to correctly use instruments like a U-tube manometer and optical transducer. Furthermore, you study the application of a dissolved oxygen sensor in the work environment. Following on, the course explains what a smart sensor is. In addition, it looks at ultrasonic sensors. You will be taught how to properly use many of these sensors.

This course is excellent for those in the electrical field and electricians or technicians who would like to increase their practical and theoretical knowledge of sensors. 

Start Course Now

All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
